keyPolicies.policyDescription: Transform mental health services with more money for schools and the NHS.
Give every child the best start in life by recruiting 20,000 more teachers and increasing school funding.
Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
Tackle the climate emergency by cutting greenhouse emissions to net-zero by 2045.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.
issues.education: Give every child the best start in life by recruiting 20,000 more teachers and increasing school funding.
issues.environment: Tackle the climate emergency by cutting greenhouse emissions to net-zero by 2045.
issues.health: Transform mental health services with more money for schools and the NHS.

contactInformation.address: Freepost RTHK-XKSH-RGEE, Liberal Democrats, 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE

endorsements.endorsement: I have struggled for 10 years to get my daughter the right support for Autism. Having Jo Swinson as our MP has put an end to that struggle.
Thanks to Jo's help, my son is no longer getting into trouble at school.

quotes.text: Thanks to Jo's help, my son is no longer getting into trouble at school.
I have struggled for 10 years to get my daughter the right support for Autism. Having Jo Swinson as our MP has put an end to that struggle.
